about_the_game:
• Place stickers of hairdryers, dogs, cats, and other silliness to build imaginative paths for Hammy to traverse to his goal.
  • Guide Hammy through over 100 uniquely hand-crafted levels.
  • Discover the interesting and surprising uses of many unique stickers.
  • Get creative with your problem-solving and discover the silliest or the simplest solution to complete the puzzles.

name: Roll: A Puzzle Contraption Demo
short_description: Roll is a creative puzzle game where you build contraptions out of stickers to roll, fling, and guide a hamster to its goal.
